originalText.text: This home daycare is wonderful. The team truly loves the children and treats them like their own, including but not limited to incredible birthday parties for the kids, with every detail tended to. The kids learn and play throughout the day in a nurturing environment. I’m a foster parent, and have had three children over the past 5 years at Los Pequenos Gigantes and they have been incredible with very difficult behaviors and separation issues. I cannot say enough positive things about my experience with them.

text.text: This home daycare is wonderful. The team truly loves the children and treats them like their own, including but not limited to incredible birthday parties for the kids, with every detail tended to. The kids learn and play throughout the day in a nurturing environment. I’m a foster parent, and have had three children over the past 5 years at Los Pequenos Gigantes and they have been incredible with very difficult behaviors and separation issues. I cannot say enough positive things about my experience with them.

originalText.text:
If we could give them 10 stars we would!

The love, attention, and care they gave our son while he was at Los Pequenos Gigantes was amazing!

The team was respectful, loving and communicative. They taught him his alphabet, crafting and writing... just to name a few.  They were very caring and attentive whenever they took the kids out on their many outings to the playground and parks. Birthdays... wow - they made sure that the kids felt super special!  Our son was so happy going every morning and was beaming when he left for the day.

Our son is now 5 years old and is transitioning to kindergarten and will carry so many of the great skills and learning that he developed  while he was with LPG.  We were very fortunate to have LPG as part of our village in raising our son during his early childhood.

originalText.text: We absolutely LOVE this daycare. Virginia and her team provide a warm, loving, safe, and fun environment for all the kids. Their days are full of celebrations, music, lessons, and trips to parks and playgrounds. We started our son here full time at 6 months and he absolutely thrived under their care and ran inside excited every morning.

text.text: We absolutely LOVE this daycare. Virginia and her team provide a warm, loving, safe, and fun environment for all the kids. Their days are full of celebrations, music, lessons, and trips to parks and playgrounds. We started our son here full time at 6 months and he absolutely thrived under their care and ran inside excited every morning.

originalText.text: Can not say enough good things about Los Pequenos Gigantes. Virginia, Flavia and Ashley are great! My little guy loved going there and had a lot of fun. He was well cared for and loved. They would go to the park, have dance parties, everyone’s birthday is celebrated, they would sing songs and learn sounds of the letters and of course lots of playtime. I would not hesitate to send another child to Los Pequenos Gigantes.

text.text: Can not say enough good things about Los Pequenos Gigantes. Virginia, Flavia and Ashley are great! My little guy loved going there and had a lot of fun. He was well cared for and loved. They would go to the park, have dance parties, everyone’s birthday is celebrated, they would sing songs and learn sounds of the letters and of course lots of playtime. I would not hesitate to send another child to Los Pequenos Gigantes.

originalText.text: Terrific daycare! My 16-month old son has been attending for 6 months now, and it's a truly loving and nurturing environment. He sings songs from daycare and verbally recognizes letters, numbers, and colors. He has an explosive vocabulary for his age, and I credit this daycare for that. The biggest plus is that he is so happy every day! It's clear he is surrounded by caretakers who sincerely care for him and make him feel loved. My only regret is that I wish I had known about them earlier for my older son.
